name: Dust Devil
loreDescription: "Once this long fight is over, will everything go back to the way it was?" mused the hero of the Dejurak desert with a deep sigh of anger.

skillDescription.base: 15.0% chance to attack again with a Basic Attack after attacking with a Basic Attack if the target survives. Can be activated once per turn.
skillDescription.max: 30.0% chance to attack again with a Basic Attack after attacking with a Basic Attack if the target survives. Can be activated once per turn.
